info.title: Template API
info.description: This is the default API from a template

get.summary: Get the status of the API server

schema.description: Used to paginate through the blockfrost keys

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the blockfrost keys
parameters.name: cursorId

schema.description: The number of blockfrost keys to return

parameters.description: The number of blockfrost keys to return
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: The type of wallet to query

parameters.description: The type of wallet to query
parameters.name: walletType

schema.description: The id of the wallet to query

parameters.description: The id of the wallet to query
parameters.name: id

schema.description: Whether to include the decrypted secret in the response

parameters.description: Whether to include the decrypted secret in the response
parameters.name: includeSecret

post.description: Creates a wallet, it will not be saved in the database, please ensure to remember the mnemonic

network.description: The network the Cardano wallet will be used on

schema.description: The number of API keys to return

parameters.description: The number of API keys to return
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Used to paginate through the API keys

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the API keys
parameters.name: cursorApiKey

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

usageLimited.description: Whether the API key is usage limited. Meaning only allowed to use the specified credits or can freely spend

usageCredits.description: The credits allowed to be used by the API key. Only relevant if usageLimited is true.

permission.description: The permission of the API key

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

id.description: The id of the API key to update. Provide either id or apiKey

apiKey.description: The API key to update. Provide either id or apiKey

usageCredits.description: The remaining credits allowed to be used by the API key. Only relevant if usageLimited is true.

status.description: The status of the API key

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

id.description: The id of the API key to delete. Provide either id or apiKey

apiKey.description: The API key to delete. Provide either id or apiKey

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

get.description: Gets the payment status. It needs to be created first with a POST request.

schema.description: The number of payments to return

parameters.description: The number of payments to return
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Used to paginate through the payments

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the payments
parameters.name: cursorIdentifier

schema.description: The network the payments were made on

parameters.description: The network the payments were made on
parameters.name: network

schema.description: The address of the smart contract where the payments were made to

parameters.description: The address of the smart contract where the payments were made to
parameters.name: contractAddress

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Creates a payment request and identifier. This will check incoming payments in the background.

network.description: The network the payment will be received on

agentIdentifier.description: The identifier of the agent that will be paid

paymentType.description: The type of payment contract used

contractAddress.description: The address of the smart contract where the payment will be made to

submitResultTime.description: The time after which the payment has to be submitted to the smart contract

unlockTime.description: The time after which the payment will be unlocked

refundTime.description: The time after which a refund will be approved

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

patch.description: Completes a payment request. This will collect the funds after the unlock time.

network.description: The network the payment was received on

contractAddress.description: The address of the smart contract where the payment was made to

hash.description: The hash of the AI agent result to be submitted

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

get.description: Gets the purchase status. It needs to be created first with a POST request.

schema.description: The number of purchases to return

parameters.description: The number of purchases to return
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Used to paginate through the purchases

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the purchases
parameters.name: cursorIdentifier

schema.description: The network the purchases were made on

parameters.description: The network the purchases were made on
parameters.name: network

schema.description: The address of the smart contract where the purchases were made to

parameters.description: The address of the smart contract where the purchases were made to
parameters.name: contractAddress

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Creates a purchase and pays the seller. This requires funds to be available.

identifier.description: The identifier of the purchase. Is provided by the seller

network.description: The network the transaction will be made on

sellerVkey.description: The verification key of the seller

contractAddress.description: The address of the smart contract where the purchase will be made to

paymentType.description: The payment type of smart contract used

unlockTime.description: The time after which the purchase will be unlocked

refundTime.description: The time after which a refund will be approved

submitResultTime.description: The time by which the result has to be submitted

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

patch.description: Requests a refund for a completed purchase. This will collect the refund after the refund time.

identifier.description: The identifier of the purchase to be refunded

network.description: The network the Cardano wallet will be used on

smartContractAddress.description: The address of the smart contract holding the purchase

400.description: Bad Request (possible parameters missing or invalid)

post.description: Registers an agent to the registry.

network.description: The Cardano network used to register the agent on

paymentContractAddress.description: The smart contract address of the payment contract to be registered for

sellingWalletVkey.description: The payment key of a specific wallet used for the registration

tags.description: Tags used in the registry metadata

api_url.description: Base URL of the agent, to request interactions

capability.description: Provide information about the used AI model and version

requests_per_hour.description: The request the agent can handle per hour

delete.description: Deregisters a agent from the specified registry.

schema.description: The identifier of the registration (asset) to be deregistered

parameters.description: The identifier of the registration (asset) to be deregistered
parameters.name: assetName

schema.description: The network the registration was made on

parameters.description: The network the registration was made on
parameters.name: network

schema.description: The address of the wallet holding the registration

parameters.description: The address of the wallet holding the registration
parameters.name: address

get.description: Gets the payment sources including the status.

schema.description: The number of payment sources to return

parameters.description: The number of payment sources to return
parameters.name: take

schema.description: Used to paginate through the payment sources

parameters.description: Used to paginate through the payment sources
parameters.name: cursorId

network.description: The network the payment source will be used on

paymentType.description: The type of payment contract used

blockfrostApiKey.description: The blockfrost api key to be used for the payment source

FeePermille.description: The fee in permille to be used for the payment source. The default contract uses 50 (5%)

AdminWallets.description: The wallet addresses of the admin wallets (exactly 3)

FeeReceiverNetworkWallet.description: The wallet address of the network fee receiver wallet

CollectionWallet.description: The wallet address and note of the collection wallet (ideally a hardware wallet). Please backup the mnemonic of the wallet.

PurchasingWallets.description: The mnemonic of the purchasing wallets to be added. Please backup the mnemonic of the wallets.

SellingWallets.description: The mnemonic of the selling wallets to be added. Please backup the mnemonic of the wallets.

id.description: The id of the payment source to be updated

blockfrostApiKey.description: The blockfrost api key to be used for the payment source

CollectionWallet.description: The wallet address and note of the collection wallet (ideally a hardware wallet). Usually should not be changed. Please backup the mnemonic of the old wallet before changing it.

AddPurchasingWallets.description: The mnemonic of the purchasing wallets to be added

AddSellingWallets.description: The mnemonic of the selling wallets to be added

RemovePurchasingWallets.description: The ids of the purchasing wallets to be removed. Please backup the mnemonic of the old wallet before removing it.

RemoveSellingWallets.description: The ids of the selling wallets to be removed. Please backup the mnemonic of the old wallet before removing it.

page.description: The page number of the payment source. Usually should not be changed

latestIdentifier.description: The latest identifier of the payment source. Usually should not be changed

delete.description: Deletes a payment source. WARNING will also delete all associated wallets and transactions.

schema.description: The id of the payment source to be deleted

parameters.description: The id of the payment source to be deleted
parameters.name: id
